subject: Football
Television
lead_paragraph: Pat Summerall is 76 and is no longer the No. 1 voice of a network’s N.F.L. broadcasts, but he sounds as happy as he has ever been.
snippet: Pat Summerall is 76 and is no longer the No. 1 voice of a network’s N.F.L. broadcasts, but he sounds as happy as he has ever been.
